channel.title: Amritpal Singh on Amrit's Corner
channel.description: Recent content in Amritpal Singh on Amrit's Corner

item.title: Navigating Streams: Comparing ungetc(), fseek(), and rewind() for BMP Images with Insights into BMP Image Structure
item.description: Index Link to heading The case of a few bytes Results Why is this happening? A better way to do things Bitmap File header Device-Independent Bitmap Too Long didn’t read Footnotes The case of a few bytes Link to heading I’ve been working on a small hobby project/program of mine. It implements image rotation by some angle (in degrees). I chose the bitmap format to write back the image that was rotated, the input image is also expected to be a bitmap image.

item.title: Realization
item.description: I have been wondering why I suck at what I do, why I’m the least skilled among my skilled peers. After pondering on it for a while, I have come to realise - I simply do not do what I want, instead I chase after what I think I want which will lead me to become more skilled. But I realise that now as I see at my past self, who got me to the point where I am today, by doing what I wanted.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello to the internet! This is just a placeholder post that I made so that my Blog isn’t empty. Hope you don’t mind! Check out my github! Thanks for reading this. See ya’ around.
